job_description: Senior Business Analyst (SQL, Azure DevOps) - job post DSMH LLC Chicago, IL 60661 $45 - $50 an hour -  Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $45 - $50 an hour Job Type Contract Senior Data Analyst- SQL, Snowflake, Azure DevOps Location: Peoria, IL, Chicago, IL, or Irving, TX Position’s Contributions to Work Group: - The Digital Analytics Business Data Analyst will have responsibility to support multiple Aftermarket part Digital Products. This responsibility includes investigation of various customer questions about the products as well as coordinating with multiple projects that are making requests while ensuring the applications maintain the highest quality Day to day tasks will vary between attending meetings to discuss business strategy topics, meeting with customers to answer product questions/deliver product training, working with team members to investigate and solve technical product issues, and analyzing big data to provide specific customer insights. Typical Job Responsibilities include: ● Responsible to lead applications projects and prioritize incoming requests for the team ● Ability to analyze data issues in the Digital Products, and summarize findings to various levels of management ● Provides application/technical leadership, guidance, and assistance to other team members including participating in the reviews of functional and technical designs to identify areas of risk and/or missing requirements. ● Create and provide team metrics and reporting on the various activities occurring within the application ● Communicate application changes to various stakeholders and represent the team’s status back to the various projects requesting work. ● Coordinate integrated testing and customer acceptance testing of components that requires careful planning and execution to ensure timely, quality results. ● Escalate and resolve issues that the team encounters that may prohibit their success. This could be to a variety of different roles. It may be to a project manager that requires work from the team, or other leaders. ● Assists customers with documentation, training and usability efforts. ● Be the liaison for the team for Integrates processes across functional organizations. ● Participate in technology evaluation and recommendations. ● Participate in the development and alignment of the IT roadmaps to IT and Business strategy Interaction with team: - Typical customers include employees within multiple business processes or functions. In addition, this person may have direct relationships with IT Work environment: - Mostly remote, working with a worldwide team. Team meets in either US or Geneva about once a quarter. Education; Experience Required: - ● Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (analytics, technical, IT, physics, etc) ● 8+ years of relevant work experience Technical Skills (Required) - 3+ years experience working with SQL - Excellent knowledge of Excel and PowerPoint - 3+ years Project management experience - experience create innovative solutions to solve business problems - 5+ years stakeholder management - Experience in a dealer facing role (Desired) - ● 1+ years of experience in design and prototyping dynamic views and visualizations for large and complex data sets in Tableau and/or Power BI - ● Working knowledge of one or more programming languages (Python preferred) - ● Experience with data structures using SQL - ● Strong knowledge of SQL, DevOps, Excel, Alteryx, Snowflake is a plus - ● Knowledge of Aftermarket industry Soft Skills (Required) - ● Strong communication & presentation skills - ● Self-starter and driven while working well in team environment - ● Strong attention to detail in order to spot inaccuracies in coding or data Job Type: Contract Pay: $45.00 - $50.00 per hour Schedule: Monday to Friday Work Location: One location If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.

SR Business Analyst- Web- Consultant - job post Intone Networks 15 reviews Rosemont, IL Contract You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Job Type Contract SR Business Analyst- Web- Consultant The Senior Web Business Analyst (Sr. BA) leverages the same foundational business analysis skills as a business analyst, additionally taking on complex, high-profile projects, with several business units or departments, multiple integrated systems, and multiple organizations such as coordination with vendor resources, as well as provide guidance to fellow business analysts. Responsibilities: Works with business customers to identify and coordinate new IT system development and enhancements, across more than one system, team, technology, and business line. Assumes project management responsibilities, when a project manager is not assigned to the team or project including developing high level project plan and timeline, identifying, tracking, monitoring and communicating project-related issues, scope changes, variances and contingencies that may arise during the project lifecycle and facilitating solutions with the appropriate stakeholders as well as creating communication plans and maintaining effective communications and working relationships with stakeholders and project team members. Assumes Scrum Master capabilities where an agile process is in place and a scrum master has not been assigned to the project or team, through facilitating all agile ceremonies including daily stand ups, grooming and planning sessions, retrospective sessions, demo/review sessions and acceptance criteria refinement sessions. Within Azure DevOps, sets up the team and project structure, iteration and board and manages the backlog, sprints and dashboards, adjusts the sprint process to adapt to the team and project requirements. Understands the Agile Methodology and knows where to implement it and where it is not helpful, adapts requirement gathering and analysis to support incremental and iterative development. Generates deliverables templates such as Business Requirements Documents, Data Mapping Documents, Epic/Features, User Stories, User Acceptance Test Cases, etc. Analyze existing tools (applications) and databases and provide solution recommendations to identified requirements Create deliverables such as process flows, wireframes, mockups and functional prototypes to effectively communicate design strategies and detailed interaction behaviors. Become a Subject Matter Expert on a variety of packages and custom business applications including User Experience best practices. Qualifications: 8+ years of prior experience as a Business Analyst or other IT role, such as support or development. BA / BS in IT, statistics, computer science, mathematics, information management, business or a related field or equivalent experience. Strong User Experience background. Comfortable with concepts such as user-centric design, personas, user research and common tools and methods. Extensive experience with web application development. Able to visualize and explain concepts on the fly using a whiteboard or the latest tools such as Mural as well as have stellar documentation skills with hands on experience with MS Visio for use case diagrams, cross-functional process flows, entity relationship diagrams, etc. Strong investigative, analytical skills. Excellent communicator Skilled at defining and documenting business and functional requirements for ongoing system enhancement initiatives in agile software development environments. Experience writing clear acceptance criteria to a testable level. Experience setting up and leading in all Agile meetings including: sprint planning, sprint grooming, review, demo, stand-up, and retrospective sessions as well as working with development teams applying feature-driven development concepts. Experience in all phases of product, software, and testing lifecycles. Clear and concise verbal and written communication skills. Curious, self-motivated, independent. Firm understanding of relational databases, database structures and design, and data management. Beginner to moderate SQL knowledge PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS 3+ years of experience in healthcare benefits. 2+ years of experience using Azure DevOps
